elements.name: Verify video can be played

steps.name: User has opened the browser
User has navigated to the login page of JTK Learn app "https://polban-space.cloudias79.com/jtk-learn/"
User enters username "pelajar1@example.com" and password "pelajar1"
User clicks on the login button
User clicks on course "Komputer Grafik"
User clicks on the continue button
User clicks on one of the video in the navigation bar
User should be able to see the page title "Komputer Grafik"
User should be able to play the video
User should be able to see the next or previous button
The course name of id 4 and material name of id 9 should be the same as in the database

elements.name: Verify PDF file can be opened and read

steps.name: User has opened the browser
User has navigated to the login page of JTK Learn app "https://polban-space.cloudias79.com/jtk-learn/"
User enters username "pelajar1@example.com" and password "pelajar1"
User clicks on the login button
User clicks on course "Komputer Grafik"
User clicks on the continue button
User clicks on the example PDF material
User should be able to read the PDF file with material id 10
User should be able to see the next or previous button
The course name of id 4 and material name of id 10 should be the same as in the database
User has opened the browser
User has navigated to the login page of JTK Learn app "https://polban-space.cloudias79.com/jtk-learn/"
User enters username "luthfipelajar2@example.com" and password "luthfipelajar2"
User clicks on the login button
User session is initialized
User is navigated to the dashboard page
User clicks on "Kursus Saya" navigation

elements.name: Pelajar belum memulai pembelajaran

steps.name: the user is on the courses page
the first course card shows a progress of "0%"
the overview page for that course is displayed
the user clicks the "Lanjutkan Kursus" button on the overview page
the course content page is displayed
the navigation title displays the course name from the database (column “nama_course”)
the progress bar is empty
the progress percentage is "0%"
the learning achievement details match the database
the navigation menu lists materials first, then quizzes
all navigation items have a white background
each material and quiz name matches the database
User has opened the browser
User has navigated to the login page of JTK Learn app "https://polban-space.cloudias79.com/jtk-learn/"
User enters username "luthfipelajar2@example.com" and password "luthfipelajar2"
User clicks on the login button
User session is initialized
User is navigated to the dashboard page
User clicks on "Kursus Saya" navigation

elements.name: Pelajar sudah memulai pembelajaran, tetapi belum menyelesaikan

steps.name: the user is on the courses page
the first course card shows a progress between "1%" and "99%"
the overview page for that course is displayed
the user clicks the "Lanjutkan Kursus" button on the overview page
the course content page is displayed
the navigation title displays the course name from the database (column “nama_course”)
the progress bar is partially filled
the progress percentage is between "1%" and "99%"
the learning achievement details match the database
the navigation menu lists materials first, then quizzes
some navigation items have a white background (incomplete)
some navigation items have a green background (completed)
each material and quiz name matches the database
Completed items in the navigation should match the database
User has opened the browser
User has navigated to the login page of JTK Learn app "https://polban-space.cloudias79.com/jtk-learn/"
User enters username "luthfipelajar2@example.com" and password "luthfipelajar2"
User clicks on the login button
User session is initialized
User is navigated to the dashboard page
User clicks on "Kursus Saya" navigation

elements.name: Halaman konten kursus - Pelajar sudah menyelesaikan kursus (TC3)

steps.name: User has completed courses in database
User switches to "Selesai" tab
System displays active tab "Selesai"
the first course card shows a progress of "100%"
the user clicks the "Lihat Kursus" button on the overview page
the course content page is displayed
the navigation title displays the course name from the database (column “nama_course”)
the progress bar is full
the progress percentage is "100%"
the learning achievement details match the database
each material and quiz name matches the database
the navigation menu lists materials first, then quizzes
all navigation items have a green background (completed)
Completed items in the navigation should match the database
